messages.content: Rebecca is a teacher, a mum of two and a long standing supporter of the Green Party. She moved to Nottingham in 2007 where she now works full time. Rebecca is very well practised at managing heavy workloads and a busy family life.

messages.title: #STAND UP FOR WHAT MATTERS
messages.content:
This election isn't about the next 5 years – it's about the next 50 years. The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit. We have the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country – and our place in the world. The Green Party offers a different kind of politics. 

- To shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment.
- To build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services.
- To put power back in your hands through a citizen’s democracy.

Every Green vote on 8 June will help make that vision a reality. If you agree with us, stand with us. The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up. But it's in your hands. Stand with us for housing, schools, our NHS, our environment, and our future. We stand up for what matters. Vote Green Party on 8 June!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: an economy that works for all

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Conservatives think they have this election sewn up.

issues.brexitEurope: The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit.
issues.economy: an economy that works for all, to shape an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment
issues.education: would focus on making sure that our local schools have adequate funding in place, that university tuition fees were scrapped and would promote a comprehensive system of local schools, quality education, no tuition fees
issues.environment: would challenge policies that led to an increase in air pollution, contributed to climate change and would promote investment in renewable energy, fossil free, affordable energy
issues.health: Affordable housing for all would also be on her agenda, taking back our health service

community.content: Affordable housing for all would also be on her agenda.

leaflet.personalStatement: The Green Party in Nottingham is growing, be part of it.
